chapters.title: Chapter 27: To Be Alone
chapters.info: Sora Grady, p. 444 (569)—Jur's wife. She disapproved of her husband's decision to come for the amnesty, but lives with it. She is somehow connected to Jur by a bond that the Asha'man believe is similar to the bond between Warder and Aes Sedai. See also Grady, Jur.
